derivation: once (by contraction) אֶחָב (Jeremiah 29:22); from H251 (אָח) and H1 (אָב); brother (i.e. friend) of (his) father;
outline:
Ahab = "father's brother"
  1. king of Israel, son of Omri, husband of Jezebel
  2. false prophet executed by Nebuchadrezzar, time of Jeremiah
strongs_def: Achab, the name of a king of Israel and of a prophet at Babylon
